Variable Documentation

const IOEndl endl

The common IOEndl object. endl can be passed to OutputDevice to print carriage returns.

It is better to use endl rather to print "\n" or "\r\n" since this should depend on the OutputDevice.

Generated on Wed Dec 29 2010 04:19:01 for CLI by  1.7.2
